title: Black Screen and crashing after champ select!
body: Ive been trying to find ways to fix this but nothing works, this has crashed twice while im in promos and i hate it. Ive lost maybe like 10 games because of this, its random. Sometimes its a black screen and i can restart league to fix or maybe it stays loading the the loading screen and i have to restart my pc. This is also the 3rd time i have leaverbuster which is really annoying since i have to wait 20 minutes before playing a game! I just want to play but i cant do this anymore pls help or rip league lyfe

replies.body: Black screens are generally caused by connection problems failing to reach the game servers or download assets.  You should go through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this towards a fix.   Test it out in custom games as well to prevent any penalties.  Let me know if you have any questions!
